Eclipse helios:http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-ide-java-ee-developers/heliossr1
Maven 2..2.1 :http://maven.apache.org/download.html


1.安装 maven的插件：The Maven Integration for Eclipse 
Maven插件更新地址：http://m2eclipse.sonatype.org/sites/m2e（详细安装步骤也见此页面）
2.Window->Preferences->Maven->installations->Add 把maven的路径添加上
3.用SVN把项目迁出http://b3log-solo.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
4.更新gae相关资源。右键项目，run as maven build... --> Goals: gae:unpack
5.运行项目。右键项目，run as maven build... --> Goals: gae:run
6.部署项目，run as maven build... --> Goals: gae:deploy
